q0.question: Where do the group go after the protest is over ?
q0.recall: After the protest is over, the group goes to the Life Support Meeting.
q0.vectordb: After the protest is over, the group goes to the Life Cafe to meet up. They discuss recent events and Mark reveals that he filmed the riot and Buzzline wants to put it on their show. They then perform "La Vie Bohème" and celebrate the New Year together. However, when they return to their apartment, they find that all of their things are gone. They later attend Angel's funeral in a large church.

They then perform "La Vie Bohème" and celebrate the New Year together. However, when they return to their apartment, they find that all of their things are gone. They later attend Angel's funeral in a large church.
